name: Real Longboard Downhill PRO - Skateboard Game
name_original: Real Longboard Downhill PRO - Skateboard Game
description:
Download Longboard Downhill to experience an epic adventure!


“Fun and awesome, this game was built for awesomeness!!!”

“This game is really addicting... Love it!”

“This game rocks I wish I could give it 10 stars”

“It's as close to downhill skateboarding as you can get right now without actually doing it”


Choose between different skateboards and longboards, to find the perfect ride! Drift your way to success by mastering the epic controls!

This game is loved by skateboarders all over the world, but its easy to skate! Skateboarders and non-skateboarders will all enjoy this game, as the controls are simple and fun to use.

There are many levels to play and different difficulties for casual to hardcore gamers! Fight your way from the newbie level all the way up to the god level, as your master your longboarding technique!

CUTTING-EDGE TECHNOLOGY
- Incredibly realistic lighting and shading effects.
- Optimized for iPhone 5S and 5C
- Real-time newsfeed and race results.
- Game Center integration and Facebook connectivity for sharing the highlights of your racing career.

music by:
